Gotron: Why thank you. You're pretty cool, most of the Alliance are worried=
 about fighting, I'm not worried about it too much, I try to be calm.

He s=
een her extend her hand. So he shakes her hand...
  ----- Original Message =
----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, Decem=
ber 12, 2000 10:44 AM
  Subject: Re: Lady Hawk again.


  Lady Hawk gave a =
royal smile and nod to Gotron, he didn't seem like the other Alliance bots =
she'd encountered. This one seemed more relaxed and laid back than the rest=
. He was sort of like Squizzy in manner. Thinking of Squizzy she mentally k=
icked herself for not getting her away from the base.  She had to learn who=
 she could trust so she could do her work peacefully.

  Lady Hawk extended=
 her hand palm down in a courtier style. She waited to see just how much cl=
ass this bot had. "I'm humbled by your kind words my friend." She kept her =
eyes on his movements, prepared for any conflicting interests that might oc=
cur.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
    Sent: Monday, December 11, 2000 4:55 PM
    Subject: Re: Lad=
y Hawk again.


    Gotron: I do? Thank you, you look pretty nice, too.

  =
  Gotron was happy he found someone else...
      ----- Original Message --=
--- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Mond=
ay, December 11, 2000 10:30 AM
      Subject: Lady Hawk again.


        La=
dy Hawk was bored in her lab. she'd played with all the new gadgets she cou=
ld find and now wanted something a little more fun. She stepped outside the=
 lab and looked around. Najah had never returned to bother her and she was =
very greatfull. She wandered around until she saw another bot she didn't re=
cognize. She knew that if she didn't know this bot this bot didn't know her=
. She watched his movements from a distance until she decided it was safe. =
She slowly aproached the stranger and offered a greeting. "Has anyone ever =
told you that you have a very nice frame?"  (She's talking to Gotron, take =
it away Soulstice)




        eGroups Sponsor
